title: Hint
text: Apply Newton's second law $$(F=ma)$$ considering the forces $$F_1$$, $$F_2$$, and the frictional force to find the acceleration of the sled and child system.

title: Steps
text: Step 1: Apply Newton's second law $$(F=ma)$$ to find the net force acting on the sled and child system. Step 2: Calculate the acceleration using the net force and the system's mass. Step 3: Clearly show all calculations and units.
